title: Frontend Developer
description: Work with React and modern JavaScript to build our user experience. You'll collaborate with designers and backend developers to create seamless, responsive interfaces.

title: Backend Developer
description: Build and maintain our Python/Flask backend services. Experience with databases, APIs, and cloud infrastructure is a plus.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design beautiful, intuitive interfaces for our dating platform. You'll work closely with the product and engineering teams to create delightful user experiences.

title: Content Moderator
description: Help keep Blendup safe and friendly by reviewing user-generated content and ensuring our community guidelines are followed.

title: Community Manager
description: Engage with our community, moderate discussions, and help create a positive environment for our users.
